bioghist.p: Larry R. Thompson is a genealogist who has done extensive research on Thompson families, especially in the midwestern United States.

scopecontent.p: This collection represents years of genealogical research conducted by Larry R. Thompson. Families investigated include, but are not limited to, Thompson, Kyner, Vanarsdale, Allison, Butler, and Sheperd. Thompson did his research at the Historical Society of Prnnsylvania, the Presbyterian Historical Society, the National Archives, several libraries in Richmond, and at the Mormon Family History Center in Broomall. The collection is in binders, spiral notebooks and loose papers. The materials include emails, photocopies from genealogical research sources, printouts of genealogical records, handwritten and typed correspondence, and photographs.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
